attributes.action: Recognition of Atrocities against the Gabooye People in Somaliland
attributes.additional_details:
Gabooye are the indigenous people of Somalia. They live in every country in east Africa including Djibouti, Ethiopia and Kenya.
They are mostly known as farmers, barbers, blacksmith, and shoe makers.
According to MRG report on Peoples most under threat - highest rated countries 2012 is once again Somali (SOMALILAND) in the first place, Gabooye and others with the highest percentage in the world topping to 23.66%.
"Blow the whistle" it’s time this great country stand and protect these innocent children, women and men from the hands of oppressors.
Please Help raise awareness to protect their basic human rights and save innocent life’s.
